definitions.definition: A Native American tribe who lived along the Ouachita River in Louisiana , affiliated with and now subsumed into the Caddo .
A river , the Ouachita River , which flows through Arkansas and Louisiana .

main_definition: A Native American tribe who lived along the Ouachita River in Louisiana , affiliated with and now subsumed into the Caddo .
secondary_definitions: A river , the Ouachita River , which flows through Arkansas and Louisiana .
